summary: A Korean love story about a young couple's enduring love, which is tested when 27 year old Sun-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.
cast: Woo-sung Jung|Son Ye-jin|Jong-hak Baek|Seon-jin Lee|Sang-gyu Park|Hie-ryeong Kim|Ji-hyun Seon|Bu-seon Kim|Hang Lee|In-han Jang|Byung-gil Kwon|Cheol-jin Shin|Jung-ki Kim|Yong-wook Jin|Jin-won Seo|Hyun-tak Shin|Hyeon-yeong|Yoon-Young Park|Mi-suk Park|David Lee McInnis|Oh Kwang-rok|Yeong-pil Lee|Pil Kim|Jeong-in Lee|Eun-hye Jeon|Kiya Lee|Gyeong-jin Park|Min-sung Jung|Jae-yong Jang|Kyeong-Taek Kim|Jeong-Dal Park|Hyun-Woong Ko|Yoon-hee Park|Young-ho Lee|Su-min Lee|Gyo-sik Choi|Jang-Seok Cho|Sin-Jae Cho|Ki-ho Choi|Gwang-jae Jeong
title: Nae meorisokui jiwoogae
